data.name: Prop_CalendarPath_Description
data.value: Path of books to be displayed

data.name: Prop_QueryString_Description
data.value: Default query defining the set of content to be presented using Content Query Language

data.name: Prop_QueryString2_Description
data.value: Query defining the set of content to be presented using Content Query Language. This query is selected with {Url prefix=}CQPQueryNumber url parameters

data.name: Prop_QueryString3_Description
data.value: Query defining the set of content to be presented using Content Query Language. This query is selected with {Url prefix}CQPQueryNumber url parameters

data.name: Prop_UrlParamPreFix_Description
data.value: Url param prefix used to select this portlet instance. This prefix is combined with CQPQueryNumber, CQPStartIndex and CQPPageSize strings

data.name: Prop_IsSystemAccount_Description
data.value: Execute the query in an elevated security context

data.name: Prop_EnablePaging_Description
data.value: Set it to false to list all content on one page. Set it to true to show only a given number of contents simultaneously

data.name: Prop_EnableSettingPageSize_Description
data.value: Set it to false to always use the default page size given

data.name: Prop_DefaultPageSize_Description
data.value: The given number of content are listed simultaneously when pageing is enabled

data.name: Prop_Top_Description
data.value: The first given number of content are listed

data.name: Prop_SkipFirst_Description
data.value: The first given number of content are skipped

data.name: Prop_EnableAutofilters_Description
data.value: If autofilters are enabled, system content are not shown in the result

data.name: Prop_EnableLifespanFilter_Description
data.value: If lifespan filter is enabled, only content with valid StartDate and EndDate will be in the result

data.name: Prop_CvPath_Description
data.value: Path of the .ascx query view (SenseNet.Portal.UI.Controls.QueryView control) to render query results

data.name: Prop_Params_Description
data.value: Url query parameter of the request. Include 'num'(page size), 'lr'(language) and 'cx'(CSE ID)

data.name: Prop_PageSize_Description
data.value: The given number of content are listed simultaneously

data.name: Prop_CvFolderPath_Description
data.value: The contentview used to present result content

data.name: Prop_IsSystemAccount_Description
data.value: Execute the query in an elevated security context

data.name: Prop_Tags_Description
data.value: Path of the folder containing tags

data.name: Prop_SearchPaths_Description
data.value: Only tags under these paths will be populated (separate with commas)

data.name: Prop_SearchPortletPath_Description
data.value: Path of the portlet used for search

data.name: Prop_SearchPaths_Description
data.value: Only tags under these paths will be populated (separate with commas)

data.name: Prop_MaxCount_Description
data.value: Tha maximum number of different tags to display in the cloud based on occurrencies

data.name: Prop_ContentTypes_Description
data.value: Only these content types will be examined for tags (separate with commas)

data.name: Prop_IncludeChildren_Description
data.value: the listed content types and descendants will be examined

data.name: Prop_SearchPaths_Description
data.value: Only tags under these paths will be populated (separate with commas)

data.name: Prop_ContentTypes_Description
data.value: Only these content types will be examined for tags (separate with commas)

data.name: Prop_IncludeChildren_Description
data.value: the listed content types and descendants will be examined

data.name: Prop_QueryFilter_Description
data.value: Optional filter for the children query
